mainEntity.name: What is Arbitrum and how does it improve Ethereum scalability?

acceptedAnswer.text: Arbitrum is a Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum that enhances scalability by allowing faster and cheaper transactions compared to the Ethereum main chain. For more details, visit the [Arbitrum Overview](https://offchainlabs.com/) on the official Offchain Labs website.

mainEntity.name: What are Layer 2 solutions in blockchain ecosystems?

acceptedAnswer.text: Layer 2 solutions are secondary frameworks or protocols built on top of existing blockchain platforms like Ethereum. They aim to improve the scalability and efficiency of blockchains by handling transactions off the main chain or by leveraging alternative methods. More information can be found on [Layer 2 Ethereum](https://ethereum.org/en/developers/docs/layer-2-scaling/).
